title: Batch 7 — Packaging & Release
depends_on: Batch 6 — GUI Indicator Lab (Toggles, Params, Profiles, A/B)
instructions: Tauri packaging for installers (Win; add Mac/Linux if configured).
Release notes generator and CHANGELOG; ship example Indicator Profiles and Strategy Presets under examples/.
Smoke tests on clean machine; document quickstart in README.
acceptance: Installers build on CI; quickstart path confirmed.
